skill.name: deployment-checker
skill.description: Pre-deployment validation checklist and automated readiness assessment.
skill.summary: Pre-deployment validation checklist and automated readiness assessment.
skill.author: CuriousLearner

security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-only skill providing deployment checklists and guidance. The static scanner incorrectly flagged example code patterns as executable threats, including Python exec() in a JavaScript file and Ruby backticks in documentation. The skill contains no actual executable code, no network connections, and no malicious intent. All 51 findings are false positives from pattern matching without semantic context.

content.value_statement: Ensure production deployments are safe and ready with systematic validation. Get comprehensive checklists covering code quality, security, performance, and infrastructure readiness.
actual_capabilities: Generate comprehensive deployment checklists for pre/post deployment
Assess deployment readiness across code quality, security, and infrastructure
Provide deployment report templates with scoring
limitations: Requires manual implementation of automated checks
Does not execute actual deployment commands
Checklist items need customization per project

use_cases.title: Pre-deployment validation
use_cases.description: Run comprehensive checks before production deployments to ensure all critical requirements are met

use_cases.title: Deployment readiness reports
use_cases.description: Generate detailed readiness reports with scoring for stakeholder approval and go/no-go decisions

use_cases.title: Automated deployment scripts
use_cases.description: Implement automated deployment validation scripts that integrate with CI/CD pipelines

prompt_templates.title: Basic deployment check
prompt_templates.prompt: Check if my Node.js application is ready for deployment. Focus on tests, build, security, and environment variables.

prompt_templates.title: Production deployment report
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a deployment readiness report for my production release. Include checklist validation, risk assessment, and rollback plan.

prompt_templates.title: Docker deployment validation
prompt_templates.prompt: Validate my Docker-based application deployment. Check container security, image size, health checks, and orchestration readiness.

prompt_templates.title: Database migration safety
prompt_templates.prompt: Assess the safety of my database migration deployment. Check migration scripts, rollback procedures, and data backup strategies.

output_examples.input: Check if my application is ready for deployment
output: Code Quality: All tests passing (234 tests), linting clean, 87% coverage
Security: No vulnerabilities found, HTTPS configured, auth tested
Performance: Load test passed, response time <200ms, caching enabled
Recommendation: Fix infrastructure health checks and create migration rollback before deploying

output_examples.input: Generate a deployment report for my production release
output: Recommendation: Approved for deployment with minor fixes documented
Container Security: Image scan passed, no critical vulnerabilities
Health Checks: Endpoint configured and responding

best_practices: Always test deployment scripts in staging environment first
Document all environment variables and configuration requirements
Implement health checks and monitoring before deployment
anti_patterns: Skipping security scans for faster deployment
Deploying during high-traffic periods without proper planning

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with all deployment platforms?
faq.answer: Yes, the checklists are platform-agnostic and work with AWS, Azure, GCP, Kubernetes, Docker, and traditional servers.

faq.question: What are the limitations of automated checks?
faq.answer: Automated checks validate technical requirements but cannot assess business logic, user experience, or market readiness.

faq.question: How do I integrate this with my CI/CD pipeline?
faq.answer: Use the Node.js example script as a template. Customize checks for your stack and run it as a pipeline stage.

faq.question: Is my deployment data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes, this is a documentation-only skill. It does not access your code or deployment environments.

faq.question: What should I do if checks fail?
faq.answer: Address critical failures before deployment. For warnings, assess risk and document mitigation strategies.

faq.question: How does this compare to deployment tools like Terraform?
faq.answer: This skill provides validation checklists, while tools like Terraform manage infrastructure. Use both for comprehensive deployment management.
